appStages.name: Overview
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Forecasting Sales Of Stores

Overview

This is a retail store project app containing historical weekly sales data along with various store characteristics, temporal features, economic indicators, and suitable forecasting future sales using random forest regression.

Input

Users provide:

  • + A pre-trained model for sales forecasting and validation

Output

The app delivers:

  • + Forecasted sales of stores in the data, validated by the pre-trained model

Benefits

  • + Improves inventory management by accurately predicting future sales demand.
  • + Optimizes staffing and operational planning for peak sales periods and holidays.
  • + Provides ready sales forecasts across stores in the data agnostically

Data Description

Field Name Description
StoreUnique identifier for each retail location
DateCalendar date of the sales record in YYYY-MM-DD format
SizeStore size in square feet
TemperatureDaily temperature in Fahrenheit affecting store operations
CPIConsumer Price Index measuring average change in prices paid by consumers
UnemploymentLocal unemployment rate as a percentage
YearValueYear of the sales record
MonthValueMonth number (1-12) of the sales record
DayOfMonthDay of the month (1-31) of the sales record
WeekOfYearWeek number (1-52) within the year
Fuel_PriceLocal fuel price in dollars per gallon
Weekly_SalesTotal weekly sales in dollars for the store
IsHolidayBinary indicator for whether the week includes a holiday (1 for yes, 0 for no)
TypeStore classification category
